titleStmt.title: An elegie upon the death of the thrice noble generall, Richard Dean, who departed this life the 2d. of June, 1653.
titleStmt.author: J. R.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho: Rycroft, and are to be sold by Tho: Jenner, at the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: By J: R: Merchant.
Verse - "Mourne drooping eye with pearly trickling teares,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
